dialogue.htmlContent:
[npc2.Name] can't help but laugh as [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(realise)] that [npc.name] actually [npc.verb(think)] [npc.she] [npc.verb(stand)] a chance against [npc2.herHim]. With a mocking smirk on [npc2.her] face, [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(taunt)], [npc2.speech(Hah! You should know your place, you pathetic little thing! Get down and beg for my forgiveness, before I decide to end you!)]

[style.italics(A few moments later...)]

[npc2.speechNoEffects(~Aah!~ Oh, yes! That's right, ruin my pussy! ~Mmm!~ I'm your bitch! #IF npc2.isVisiblyPregnant() #THEN Fuck me! #ELSE Breed me! #ENDIF ~Aah!~ Yes!)]
Having put [npc.name] in [npc.her] place, you gather your things and make your exit, leaving [npc.herHim] panting and moaning on the floor behind you.

Having put you in your place, [npc.name] gathers [npc.her] things and makes [npc.her] exit, leaving you panting and [pc.moaning] on the floor. After a few minutes, you've got your breath back, and, getting your own things in order, you brush yourself down and set off on your way.
As you find yourself thinking about the nature of centaurs, one suddenly appears before you! From the lustful look in [npc.her] [npc.eyes], you can tell that [npc.she] wants some sex...
Having put [npc.name] in [npc.her] place, you gather your things and make your exit, leaving [npc.herHim] panting and moaning on the floor behind you.

Having put you in your place, [npc.name] gathers [npc.her] things and makes [npc.her] exit, leaving you panting and [pc.moaning] on the floor. After a few minutes, you've got your breath back, and, getting your own things in order, you brush yourself down and set off on your way.
